channel.title: How do i keep my server online?
channel.description: I want to keep my server on 24/7. But how? I dont want to keep my computer on 24/7!

item.title: How do i keep my server online?
item.dc:creator: @iScape0 iScape0
item.description:
@iScape0 wrote:

Just run it at night and turn off during the day? Simple.

Read full topic

item.title: How do i keep my server online?
item.dc:creator: @The_Noob_Coder The Noob Coder
item.description:
@The_Noob_Coder wrote:

Well since he doesnt know how to keep his server online 100%, i would take it he is a first timer. So i don’t think he would buy a 70$ VPS for his server. A 18$-25$ VPS can easly hold over 25 people with no lagg.

item.title: How do i keep my server online?
item.dc:creator: @The_Noob_Coder The Noob Coder
item.description:
@The_Noob_Coder wrote:

VPS, is the only way to keep it online 100%. I use VPSlands.com there cheap and good in my opinion. If you don’t want to pay for it, then i would say, don’t make a RSPS. Most servers cannot last without VPS. 18$-25$ is all it costs for a good VPS. If you can’t spare that to start up your own server.

If you wish to not leave your compiler on 24/7 then your out of luck.

Read full topic
item.source: How do i keep my server online?
